price: 69. Miyaadan arag kuwaa ka dooda Aayadaha Alle: Xaggee baa loo iilay?
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ يُجَٰدِلُونَ فِيٓ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ أَنَّىٰ يُصۡرَفُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: alam tara ilā alladhīna yujādilūna fī āyāti al-lahi annā yuṣ'rafūna
